titles.title: Trafficking Victims Enhanced Protection Act of 2011

A bill to amend the William Wilberforce Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act of 2008 to prohibit the provision of peacekeeping operations assistance to governments of countries that recruit and use child soldiers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 6/22/2011--Introduced. Amends the William Wilberforce Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act of 2008 to prohibit the provision of peacekeeping operations assistance to governments of countries that recruit and use child soldiers.
